you
this expression means be to ask someone

to get married to have a wedding
ceremony vowel is a solemn promise a
very special promise so when you

how you will love each other and how you

did you have a honeymoon yes we had our

this expression means a beautiful

that people take just after they get

use honeymoon with different verbs let's
look at the following phrases you can go
somewhere on your honeymoon you can
